_sText:
This is the third custom map I ever released, and the second map for Counter Strike.
It was my first attempt on recreating a setting that has been used in an original map, and seeing how I always liked assaults setting and even the unique gameplay (read: camping), I preferred it over a nuke-themed map.
Even though the outside scenery reminds me more of GTA than of Counter Strike I am overall pretty content with the result.


The total time spent working on the project was two weeks in November 2008 and later roughly half a week in August 2010, during which I completely rebuilt CT spawn and optimized the map overall. It used to be 11MB, now it's 4.


I tried balancing the map out in a way that made it fun for all kinds of players. It features long range, mid range and short range rush combat with weapons all over the place - there are even pistols in the spawn rooms, so it should be fun for a whole while. Moreover, there are so many spots that can only be reached through jumping on the crates and money stashes which adds some more layers to the gameplay overall.

I hope you like it! Have fun.


Update August 17th:
o Constrained all weapons so the map won't lag when launching on a low-end computer
o Fixed missing radar files
o Repositioned some grenades
o Fixed weapons missing ammo
o Resolved clipping issues
o Minor fixes regarding graffiti
o Minor optimizations

[b]Update August 17th:[/b]
o Added promo video

[b]Update August 19th:[/b]
o Fixed some typos
o Fixed Credits room
o Removed env_sun
o Changed sky so it fits the skybox more
o Modified Soundscapes
